body:
I'm a little concerned because `scipy.misc.logsumexp(np.ndarray([])) = -2.0`, while our implementation gives 
```
In [13]: torch.tensor([]).exp().sum().log()
Out[13]: tensor(-inf)
```
but that can be another issue
